thread.title: 'Professor' Matt Forte schools fantasy football owners in YouTube clip
thread.title_full: 'Professor' Matt Forte schools fantasy football owners in YouTube clip - Chicago Tribune

author: chicagotribune.com
title: 'Professor' Matt Forte schools fantasy football owners in YouTube clip
text:
Matt Forte zings fantasy football players in a new ad appearing on YouTube.
"You think you found a few players who have better numbers than me? You remember all of last year's stats and you want to go over them now? Yeah, you really sound like a fun guy," Forte says.
The Bears running back co-stars in Lenovo's " Fantasy Online College " spot with Broncos wide receiver DeMaryius Thomas and Chiefs running back Jamaal Charles.
Last year Forte parodied his sometimes uneasy relationship with his fantasy owners in the mockumentary "Tough Season 2."
"I just think it's funny how much people get really crazy about it," Forte told RedEye . "Most time people tell me, â€˜Good job, you helped me win.' But if you have a bad game, on Twitter they can really come at you."
Privacy Policy Matt Forte Fantasy Football Games Chicago Bears
